title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Toyota Prado (2009-2015) 3.0L KDJ150 155R – ProVent Oil Catch Can Vehicle Specific Kit OS-PROV-07

content.rendered:
MANN ProVent Oil Catch Can Kit suits:
Toyota Prado (sep2009-2015) 3.0L D-4D
150 Series KDJ150R 155R Diesel 1KD-FTV TD

**NOTE: Designed for Australian Models (Right Hand Drive), Overseas Models May Have Differences.

This kits comes complete with everything you require to fit to your vehicle including a stainless steel mounting bracket, Oil resistant hoses clamps the lot. Blocked Egr’s (Exhaust Gas Recirculation Valves) are a common and expensive problem for the Toyota D4D diesel engine, fitting this Oil catch can will save you a fortune and keep the engine performing like the first day you drove it !

Provent Kit Includes:
:: Provent Unit
:: Stainless Steel Bracket
:: Top & Bottom Hoses
:: Drain Kit


MANN+HUMMEL ProVent Catch Can’s separate oil from the air intake and saves costly repairs due to blocked EGR’S, Turbo’s & intercoolers.
Advantages: • Highly efficient Oil separation Providing ideal Protection for the Turbocharger and other components installed downstream • Low Pressure loss • Less motor Oil consumption in comparison to less efficient separators or conventional open systems • Maintenance friendly: fittings not removed during element maintenance • Universal usage: exceptional for variable Flow rates • Integrated safety against irregularly high Crankcase Pressure • No electrical energy required • Low running costs • Compact design • Light and robust design
